sentences: Marcus Jamal Hopson (born July 18, 1985), known professionally as Hopsin, is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producer from Los Angeles.
In 2007, he was signed to Ruthless Records, and had founded his own record label, Funk Volume, in 2009.
In 2007, he was signed to Ruthless Records, and had founded his own record label, Funk Volume, in 2009.
He would then go on to found another record label, Undercover Prodigy, in 2016.
Marcus Hopson was born on July 18, 1985, in Los Angeles, and was raised in the largely Hispanic Panorama City neighborhood of Los Angeles.
